Katniss Everdeen: As the protagonist of "The Hunger Games," Katniss is a strong and resourceful character who has survived against all odds. Swapping lives with her would give me the opportunity to face challenges and overcome them, just like she does in the story.

Tony Stark: As the Iron Man, Tony Stark is a billionaire inventor and superhero with advanced technology at his disposal. Swapping lives with him would allow me to explore the world of high-tech gadgets and gear, and possibly even contribute to groundbreaking inventions.

Captain Marvel: As a powerful superhero, Captain Marvel has the ability to fly, shoot energy beams from her fingertips, and possess superhuman strength. Swapping lives with her would allow me to harness these incredible powers and use them to help others.

Frodo Baggins: As the protagonist of "The Lord of the Rings," Frodo Baggins embarks on a perilous journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth. Swapping lives with him would allow me to experience the excitement and adventure of traveling to new places and facing challenges along the way.

Atticus Finch: As the protagonist of "To Kill a Mockingbird," Atticus Finch is a lawyer who defends a black man against an unjust charge, and teaches his children important life lessons. Swapping lives with him would allow me to learn from his wisdom and experience, and possibly make a difference in the world.
